entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023
